mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_menu WHERE deleted = 0 AND parent_id = #{id} ORDER BY order_num ASC
SELECT m.* FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id WHERE rm.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.deleted = 0 ORDER BY m.order_num ASC

SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.deleted = 0 AND m.status = 1 ORDER BY m.order_num ASC

SELECT DISTINCT m.permission FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON rm.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.deleted = 0 AND m.status = 1 AND m.type = 'F' AND m.permission IS NOT NULL
